data.name: Life is Feudal: MMO. Zealot Starter Pack
data.detailed_description:
With Life is Feudal: MMO 0.2.0 Update every explorer can now go to the Newbie Island for free! From now on, you can start your journey completely for free without buying game starter-packs, and later, if you’d like to continue it on the mainland —
all you need is a ticket to Abella.

A great excuse to gather your friends and, explore new map and start building a kingdom that will be famous for centuries to come!
And don't forget to user Counselors Feature to get a special reward for teaching your friends!

Zealot Starter Pack Includes the following benefits:


  • 20000 God’s Favor

    Premium in-game currency. Can be spent on customization and services in our premium shop.

  • 3 Tickets to abella

    Transfers your character to the Abella - main continent. Abella does not have limitations that Newbie Island have. Cannot be dropped after death. Cannot be transfered. Consumable.

  • One random Weapon Skin unlock

    We will permanently unlock one random weapon skin customization. You will be able to apply this skin across all the characters on your account in this region. Warning: When opening random skins from any game pack, if you have already unlocked a skin in your Premium Shop inventory, then you will only be able to get a refund with God's Favor.

  • Uncommon Hat Skin

    We will permanently unlock one random hat skin customization. You will be able to apply this skin across all the characters on your account in this region. Warning: When opening random skins from any game pack, if you have already unlocked a skin in your Premium Shop inventory, then you will only be able to get a refund with God's Favor.

  • Rare Royal Armor Set Skin

    We will permanently unlock one random Royal Armor Set skin customization (100 wearing skill required). You will be able to apply this skin across all the characters on your account in this region. Warning: When opening random skins from any game pack, if you have already unlocked a skin in your Premium Shop inventory, then you will only be able to get a refund with God's Favor.

  • Premium Subscription (90 Days)

    Receive special benefits with the premium account.

Premium Subscription unlocks the following benefits:




  • Leveling up 2 skills at the same time

    Allows you to level up any 2 skills from any Skill Tree at a Time

  • 2X Larger Experience Pools

    Extended Experience pools of 1 000 000 points for easier skill progression

  • Trade post free storage increased to 1000

    Trade Post storage capacity increased to 1000 in all Trading Posts without paying God's Favors for an upkeep

  • 150 cells of land for free

    Private claim of 150 tiles (600 sq.m.) for free with possibility to extend it to 250 tiles (1000 sq.m), paying only for added tiles

  • Crafting Experience Gain booster (Power Hour)

    Can be used once a day per every character, provides 2X faster crafting experience gain

  • Combat Experience Gain booster (Power Hour)

    Can be used once a day per every character, provides 2X faster combat experience gain

  • Automatic Death Insurance

    Automatic Death Insurance: mitigates a part of your XP loss in the event of your death (5 skill points for crafting and 5 for combat skill).

  • One random Full Set of Armor Skin unlock

    Unlock is valid for 1 month. We will unlock a new random full set of armor skin every month, while subscription is active. Warning: When opening random skins from any game pack, if you have already unlocked a skin in your Premium Shop inventory, then you will only be able to get a refund with God's Favor.

  • One random Weapon Skin unlock

    Unlock is valid for 1 month. We will unlock a new random weapon skin every month, while subscription is active. Warning: When opening random skins from any game pack, if you have already unlocked a skin in your Premium Shop inventory, then you will only be able to get a refund with God's Favor.

data.short_description: Zealot Starter Pack includes the following benefits: 20000 God's Favor 90 Days of Premium Subscription 3 Tickets to the Abella One Random Weapon Skin Unlock Uncommon Hat SkinRare Royal Armor Set Skin
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Czech, Hungarian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit - Windows 7 (SP1), Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel - Core i5 2.5 GHz, AMD - Phenom II X4 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA - GeForce® 660, AMD - Radeon™ HD 6970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit - Windows 7 (SP1), Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel - Core i7 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA - GeForce® GTX 980, AMD - Radeon™ RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space

package_groups.title: Buy Life is Feudal: MMO. Zealot Starter Pack
